contextId.information: This phrase uses two negative thoughts to express a positive thought. AT: "we use the word of God correctly" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: we do not mishandle the word of God

contextId.information: This can be stated as a positive. AT: "So we remain confident" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: So we do not become discouraged

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive terms. AT: "Only be tied together with believers" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: Do not be tied together with unbelievers

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "I will boast only of my weaknesses" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: I will not boast, except about my weaknesses
